response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. Considering its unique features and unparalleled benefits, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This opportunity is not to be missed, as it represents a substantial saving compared to its market value. I believe this investment will greatly benefit you and provide you with the advantages you seek. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
